xml.title: 4. 300x250 Big Box Ad (S)
xml.code: Advertisement
xml.dependencies:
uses AdManager js object and MetaDataManager js object see head tag in this page source for more info
uses function BigboxAd to generate its entire content
must be in right rail
xml.head:
<!-- sni::hidden -->
 <script type="text/javascript">var mdManager=new MetaDataManager();
 mdManager.addParameter("Abstract","Do you love to cook? Cooking Channel's shows and top global chefs share their best recipes and demonstrate their specialties in cooking technique videos.");
 mdManager.addParameter("CategoryDspName","HOME");
 mdManager.addParameter("Classification","HOME,COOK");
 mdManager.addParameter("DetailId","41501");
 mdManager.addParameter("PageNumber","1");
 mdManager.addParameter("SctnDspName","HOME");
 mdManager.addParameter("SctnId","41501");
 mdManager.addParameter("SctnName","HOME");
 mdManager.addParameter("Site","COOK");
 mdManager.addParameter("Title","Cooking Channel - Recipes, Shows and Cooking Videos from Top Global Chefs");
 mdManager.addParameter("Type","SECTION");
 mdManager.addParameter("UniqueId","COOK-SECTION-41501-1");
 mdManager.addParameter("Url","/cook/home/0,1001122,,00.html");</script>
 
 
 <script type="text/javascript">
 mdManager.addParameter('UserId', userIdCookieUserId);
 mdManager.addParameter('UserIdEmail', userIdEmail);
 mdManager.addParameter('UserIdCreateDt', userIdCookieCreateDt);
 mdManager.addParameter('UserIdVersion', userIdCookieVersion);
 </script>
 
 <script type="text/javascript">
 var adManager = new AdManager();
 initAdManager(adManager, mdManager);
 </script>
xml.iframe: <iframe id="moduleHelper" src="BigBoxAd_iframe.html" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0" topmargin="0" leftmargin="0" allowtransparency="true" width="100%" height="310"></iframe>
